TREE.name: TREE
TREE.description: This place is considered unsafe. Monsters are roaming these areas at unknown intervals. Keep your guard up to avoid a costly mistake.

ROAD.description: A road that leads from one place to the next. Who knows where this one might lead to.

HOUSE.description: Someone lives in this house. Hopefully, you're invited. Otherwise, you might be in for a great encounter!

STONE.description: A castle fit for kings. You might meet some royalty here.
